dcterms:description: A motorcycle performance assessment example illustrating the evaluation hierarchy for assessing the operation of a motorcycle, including attributes such as handling, transmission, and brakes.
dcterms:title: Motorcycle Performance Assessment Example

dcterms:creator: T. Isitt
dcterms:description: A comprehensive assessment of motorcycle performance focusing on various attributes such as engine quality, operation, and general finish, evaluated through a decision matrix.
dcterms:title: Motorcycle Performance Assessment
